  • Uses of OWriteCache in com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.cache.local

    Classes in com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.cache.local that implement OWriteCache
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    OWOWCache
    Write part of disk cache which is used to collect pages which were changed on read cache and store them to the disk in background thread.
